addNotifier(address).notice: Adds a new notifier to the hub.

entrypoint().notice: Returns the entrypoint of the hub.

isNotifier(address).notice: Returns whether the notifier is registered.

removeNotifier(address).notice: Removes a notifier from the hub.

stakerTotal(address,uint48).notice: Returns the total amount of stake for a staker.
